mema tharmastat walwaya motar rathaye sisilana paddhathiya palanaya karana kotasayi.mema kotasa hirawima ho nisi lesa kriyakirimata apohosath wi yayi nam enjima oowarhit wima prathipalayak wiya haka.obe motar rathaya abhirahas andamin oowarhit wanne nam saha ihatha sadahan ekadu hethuwak ho soyaganimata nohaki nam,eya dosha sahitha tharmastat walwaya wiya hakiya.mema pariksha kirim ha sawikirima wruththiya karmikayeku wisin kala yuthuya.
